          <title>
            <string language="en">A solar eclipse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Solareklipse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une éclipse solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um eclipse solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'eclipse solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ηλιακή έκλειψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un eclipse solar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the relative positions of the Sun, Earth and Moon during a solar eclipse.  The Moon casts a shadow on the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar eclipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die relativen Positionen 
der Sonne, der Masse und des Mondes während einer Solareklipse. 
Der Mond wirft einen Schatten auf der Masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les positions relatives
du soleil, de la terre et de la lune pendant une éclipse solaire. 
La lune moule une ombre sur la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as posições relativas 
do sol, da terra e da lua durante um eclipse solar. A lua molda 
uma sombra na terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le posizioni relative
del sole, della terra e della luna durante l'eclipse solare. La 
luna lancia un'ombra sulla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σχετικές θέσεις του 
ήλιου, της γης και του φεγγαριού κατά τη διάρκεια μιας ηλιακής 
έκλειψης. Το φεγγάρι πετά μια σκιά στη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las posiciones 
relativas del sol, de la tierra y de la luna durante un eclipse solar.
La luna echa una sombra en la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
